page.title: 03Wimborne Town.page.1.
page.content: Wimborne is full of local history. In the older part of Wimborne is the Quarter Jack toy shop. It is one of the biggest toy-shops in Dorset and it is in East Street which is the road which leads up to the Minster. Wimborne Square has older shops too and there are lots of banks where we keep our money. There are also bus stops where buses pick people up. Near the Square is the Priest's House Museum and there is also a tourist information office where you can find things out. The Square is very busy and has a big hotel called The King's Head Hotel. The Old Mill (now a new Restaurant) near the River Allen was mentioned in the original Domesday Book. The old Queen Elizabeth Grammar School has now been divided into flats. CLARE JENNINGS. AGED 9 years.
